channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Door of faith
channel.desc: Fr. Bede talks about how the gift of faith impacts Holy Matrimony and how the life of faith sustains husband and wife through the ups and downs of married life.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick
channel.desc: Bear Woznick and Tony Orband cross Florida, Alabama and Mississippi, following the same route that Bear once traveled on bicycle.
